name: getAllMetadata
shortDescription: Returns all metadata of one peer.
description: This method returns all metadata of one peer.

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The id of the peer to get the metadata for.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the device to get the metadata for (separated by colon).

returnValue: Returns a struct with one element for each dataId containing the previously stored value. The name of the element is the dataId.
